name: ghostfile
description: Ghostfile is a simple blog publishing tool for static content backed by plain text or markdown. It exposes a minimal UI for posting, editing, and managing entries, ideal for content-focused workflows.

features.title: Markdown Support
features.description: Publish blog posts and content backed by plain text or markdown files

features.title: Markdown Editing
features.description: Write and edit content using markdown syntax with a simple editor interface

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Focus on writing with a distraction-free, lightweight blogging UI

features.title: Database Backup
features.description: Store posts as individual files for easy backup and version control

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Organize, edit, and manage blog entries through a streamlined web interface

features.title: No Database Required
features.description: Operate without database dependencies using file-based content storage

features.title: REST API
features.description: Rapidly publish and update content without complex workflows
